医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
揭示隐藏的潜力：用于神经科学研究疾病建模的类器官在我们最新的采访中，News-Medical 采访了 ACROBiosystems 的 Rosanna Zhang，讨论了在神经科学研究领域利用类器官进行疾病建模的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Unveiling-Hidden-Potential-Organoids-for-Disease-Modeling-in-Neuroscience-Research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Unveiling-Hidden-Potential-Organoids-for-Disease-Modeling-in-Neuroscience-Research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7c72ebc9-7424-4488-b5e7-3906d86ef898 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 04:44:00 -0500 Unveiling Hidden Potential: Organoids for Disease Modeling in Neuroscience Research
FluidForm Bio 通过 FRESH™ 3D 生物打印成功展示了工程心脏组织的进步FluidForm Bio 是开发仿生人体组织来治疗疾病的领导者，分享了使用 FRESH™ 3D 生物打印构建人体心脏组织的最新进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/FluidForm-Bio-successively-demonstrates-advancements-in-engineered-heart-tissues-with-FRESHe284a2-3D-bioprinting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/FluidForm-Bio-successively-demonstrates-advancements-in-engineered-heart-tissues-with-FRESHe284a2-3D-bioprinting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2526178-1f88-46b1-b770-c661ac9a7a05 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 04:01:00 -0500 FluidForm Bio successfully demonstrates advancements in engineered heart tissues with FRESH™ 3D bioprinting
阿尔茨海默病被发现有五种不同的亚型研究人员利用蛋白质组测序确定了阿尔茨海默病的五种不同的分子亚型，并提出了基于每种亚型独特的遗传和病理特征的个性化治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Alzheimers-disease-found-to-have- Five-distinct-subtypes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Alzheimers-disease-found-to-have- Five-distinct-subtypes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6b04a8a-da8e-4020-98d9-79d135c981c2 Wed, 10 Jan 2024 23:31:00 -0500 Alzheimer's disease found to have five distinct subtypes
研究揭示了 COVID-19 对大脑功能和结构的持久影响研究调查了 COVID-19 后的认知缺陷，发现 SARS-CoV-2 感染与脑损伤标志物和扣带皮层体积减少有关，而皮质类固醇可提供一定的认知保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Research-reveals-COVID-19s- permanent-impact-on-brain-function-and-struct.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Research-reveals-COVID-19s- permanent-impact-on-brain-function-and-struct.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cbda5973-716c-48d3-a640-6fd7cc78c5fe Wed, 10 Jan 2024 23:09:00 -0500 Research reveals COVID-19's lasting impact on brain function and structure
研究表明工程抗体可显着增强 Omicron 中和作用研究人员从 IgG 单克隆抗体中改造出 IgA 抗体，将针对 Omicron 的中和作用增强高达 75 倍，并为小鼠模型提供保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Study-shows-engineered-antibodies-significantly-boost-Omicron-neutralization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Study-shows-engineered-antibodies-significantly-boost-Omicron-neutralization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a77f3b9c-31a7-43f4-b59e-69c0ffb53e35 Wed, 10 Jan 2024 22:48:00 -0500 Study shows engineered antibodies significantly boost Omicron neutralization
研究发现对抗 PARP 抑制剂耐药性卵巢癌的新武器2023 年 12 月 22 日，Oncotarget 第 14 卷发表了一篇新的社论论文，题为“向治疗 PARP 抑制剂耐药性卵巢癌又迈出了一步”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Study-uncovers-new-weapon-against-PARP-inhibitor-pressive-ovarian-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Study-uncovers-new-weapon-against-PARP-inhibitor-pressive-ovarian-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2aba945a-22c6-4145-8911-1b5ea60a0caf Wed, 10 Jan 2024 22:47:29 -0500 Study uncovers new weapon against PARP inhibitor-resistant ovarian cancers
创造力与一致性：研究揭示了人类和人工智能在讲故事方面的差异研究比较了人类和 ChatGPT 的故事重述，揭示了不同的模式：人类创造性地改编故事，而 ChatGPT 则保留了核心元素，变化较少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Creativity-versus-consistency-Study-reveals-how- humans-and-AI-differ-in-storytelling.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Creativity-versus-consistency-Study-reveals-how- humans-and-AI-differ-in-storytelling.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09006f23-55f7-4f50-9c82-69e1f08b044a Wed, 10 Jan 2024 22:35:00 -0500 Creativity versus consistency: Study reveals how humans and AI differ in storytelling
“碱性水”未能成为预防复发性尿路结石的有效替代方案美国泌尿外科协会 (AUA) 官方期刊《泌尿外科杂志》一月号上的一项研究报告称，以“碱性水”销售的瓶装水不太可能成为预防复发性尿路结石的有效替代品。该期刊由威科集团 (Wolters Kluwer) 的 Lippincott 作品集出版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Alkaline-water-fails-to-be-an- effective-alternative-for-prevention-of-recurrent-urinary-stones.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Alkaline-water-fails-to-be-an- effective-alternative-for-prevention-of-recurrent-urinary-stones.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa0e3317-b0ee-456b-8f70-566cbc5c8d98 Wed, 10 Jan 2024 22:20:09 -0500 "Alkaline water" fails to be an effective alternative for prevention of recurrent urinary stones
新研究调查了美国医院在公共卫生报告方面的经验COVID-19 大流行早期阶段的美国医疗保健应对措施暴露了公共卫生报告系统和电子临床数据交换方面的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/New-study-examines-US-hospitalse28099-experiences-in-public-health-reporting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/New-study-examines-US-hospitalse28099-experiences-in-public-health-reporting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18fc4103-6372-401d-b959-cc6accd1308e Wed, 10 Jan 2024 22:14:46 -0500 New study examines U.S. hospitals’ experiences in public health reporting
硅胶腕带追踪个人 PAH 暴露量哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼公共卫生学院的环境流行病学家与俄勒冈州立大学、太平洋西北国家实验室和西奈山医学院的跨学科研究小组合作，报告了一项关于收集的空气污染暴露的新研究的结果使用纽约市孕妇佩戴的个人腕带监测器与调查问卷中的数据进行匹配。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Silicone-wristbands-track-personal-PAH-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240110/Silicone-wristbands-track-personal-PAH-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32205b3a-ab3d-40c6-8c70-85d34615fc15 Wed, 10 Jan 2024 22:10:40 -0500 Silicone wristbands track personal PAH exposure
